organisation_name: European Poultry, Egg and Game Association (EPEGA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:

relevant_communication: Food Safety along the whole supply chain, animal welfare, GMO
goals__remit: EPEGA is the European Poultry, Egg and Game Association. We are representing the interests of the EU's egg, poultry and game producers, wholesale business and foreign trade in these commodities. Traceability, food safety,animal welfare and quality controls are of major importance for the members of the association.
